ComicInfo.Title: The Memory
ComicInfo.Summary: The Memory: The Colonizers blow up the entire planet Raader is on. Domino survives aboard the ship. When the Colonizer's follow her into the Cloudwall, she flames on to destroy them and ignites the Cloudwall itself. All of the Swashbucklers except Domino and Cap'n Kidd die. Domino ends up back on Earth with her family.
